title: Oh Werewolf, My Master
description: Life for Michael, in 17th century Britain, has gone straight to hell. Discovered by his father, while pleasuring his lover, Stephen, Michael is punished and given to the church. After a year's penance, the Abbot orders him to Ireland to serve as a scribe. There he encounters what the monks call a Demon Spawn. A handsome, muscular giant of a male who teaches Michael the true meaning of submission.
author: Tadgh Faolan
